metadata.title: CVE-2021-22177 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Potential DoS was identified in gitlab-shell in GitLab CE/EE version 12.6.0or above, which allows an attacker to spike the server resource utilizationvia gitlab-shell command.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
